name: Galaxy clicker (itch) (Game Sunlight)
description:
One of the goals of the game is to buy up all the design presented in the level.

To play, click on the stones on the left side, which move in a circle. The farther the stone is from the center, the more light you get for clicking on it.

For the light received from clicks, you can buy the power of light (blue buttons) or auto-light (purple buttons).
